title: The QUIETEST Gaming PC We've Ever Built!
tags: how to build a gaming pc
description: Building a quiet gaming PC isn't easy and a hot processor like the Intel 9900K makes lowering fan speeds even harder.  But by choosing the right components we were still able to build the quietest PC yet.    Note that we FOUND the feet to this case.  They were indeed buried in the box.  :x    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  ASRock Z390 Taichi:   Intel 9900K:   MSI RTX 2080 Ti:   G.Skill Trident Z 16GB:   Silent Base 801 Black:   Silent Base 801 Orange Accents:   Silent Loop 360:   Silent Loop 280:   Pure Wings 2 120:   Pure Wings 2 140:   Silent Wings 3 140:   Silent Wings 3 120:   Dark Power Pro 11:     Enermax LiqFusion:  ttp://geni.us/LIQFUSION  Subscribe    Review units provided free of charge by the companies mentioned. This video is sponsored by BeQuiet & Enermax. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):   Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:  Join Our Folding team   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  silentpcbuild #silentcomputer #hardwarecanucks
